name: Alien Shooter (itch) (CreatGame) (CreatGame)
description:
Story

You control a human spaceship at war with the aliens. Suddenly, you hear a message from the Earth emperor telling you: "You are the only crew still alive. It is too late to turn back." Your mission is to win the war and save Earth.

Features
  • Control spaceship and shoot missile.
  • Destroy Aliens.
  • 5 levels.
  • 1 boss.
  • And more in next update 

Please test our game and send us feedback.
